attributes.action: We believe that the people of Stoke-on-Trent deserve a good local community school for every child.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the people of Stoke-on-Trent deserve a good local community school for every child.
We are apposed to giving away community resources to private sponsors.
(1). We reject the view of the City Council that academies are an integral part of BSF.
(2). We want the council to bring forward a plan for the future of secondary education based upon good local community school for every community.
(3). We want the council to meet the aim expressed in the report to the Executive Members Board of schools being in the heart of the community
(4). We want parents to have a real choice of school.
(5). Schools should belong to and be accountable to the local community through democratic control.
